news_header: Incyte reported a 16.3% revenue increase to $1.18 billion for Q4 2024, with an EPS of $1.43.
news_original_title: Incyte (INCY) Reports Q4 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
news_text: Incyte (INCY) reported $1.18 billion in revenue for the quarter ended December 2024, marking a 16.3% year-over-year increase. The EPS for this period was $1.43, compared to $1.06 a year ago. The revenue exceeded the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.15 billion by 2.63%, but the EPS fell short of the consensus estimate of $1.53 by 6.54%. Investors are advised to consider key financial metrics to gauge the company's health and stock performance. Additionally, Zacks has identified top stocks for 2025 that have shown significant gains.
